channel.title: I'm running my server on a wireless router..my friend told me
channel.description:
He said to download Utorrent. And switch the port to 43594 to let people connect to it, since my IP is changed on a WIRELESS router. And when I tried to Run after switching ports I received this message...
"Port is already in use"
Anybody got any ideas? Its pissing me off. I want to run my server 24 7 but I love my Xbox live :p

item.title: I'm running my server on a wireless router..my friend told me
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Press run in source file. THEN RUN UTORRENT.

Read full topic
